statements: SELECT * FROM dna_sequence_data;

SELECT factor_name, factor_value FROM environmental_factors WHERE factor_value > 0.5;
SELECT rd.id, rd.sample_id, es.factor_name FROM research_data rd JOIN environmental_factors es ON rd.factor_id = es.id;
SELECT ds.id, ds.sequence, es.factor_value FROM dna_sequence_data ds JOIN research_data rd ON ds.sample_id = rd.sample_id JOIN environmental_factors es ON rd.factor_id = es.id;

SELECT id, sequence, researcher_id FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence IS NOT NULL AND researcher_id IN (SELECT id FROM researchers WHERE email LIKE '%company.com%');
